title: IT MGMT - VALIDATE IT MGMT CONTROL - Phase 4.2

task_list.instruction_title:
Validate the below controls and send results in reply to this step:

C4150 Liste des SG PBS IBAN vs UBP.

C4140 - Vérification des comptes non créés sur ATLAS comparé au DICO ACCOUNT

C4181 - Check if position have an existing account (must be empty)
C4150 To be sent by [AOUADI Khalil](https://confluence.corp.ubp.ch/display/~aok) to [DER GRIGORIANTZ Marc-Alain](https://confluence.corp.ubp.ch/display/~dgm)
